author: La Vanguardia
title: Ground News - Mstyslav Chernov: “The war is not far, it's very close”
text:
Summary by La Vanguardia It's not easy to get an interview with a brand-new Oscar winner in the days following the Dolby gala. The race for the prizes is exhausting, and those who have participated need to recharge their batteries urgently. However, Mstyslav Chernov, who won the golden statuette for Best Documentary for the shocking '20 Days in Mariúpol', doesn't hesitate when 'The Vanguardia' proposes a meeting. The thing is that this multi-award-winning war correspond… Share menu 1 Articles 1 Articles All Left Center Right
